description: Saint Bernards are large, heavy set dogs that originated in the Swiss Alps during the 1700s.  Originally used as rescue dogs, they have become known as docile, loving and friendly dogs that are great household pets.  With this comprehensive ebook about the Saint Bernard, you can learn all about this interesting breed.  Topics covered include the dog's history, puppies, breed standards, health and grooming, physical and emotional characteristics and even some training tips.  Download this book today and have a guide to the Saint Bernard in your pocket!
